# macIdiomStyle

**Instance Property**

The style to use when this button appears in macOS.

## Declaration

```swift
var macIdiomStyle: UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle { get set }
```

## Discussion

Use this property when building your app with Mac Catalyst. The value [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIButton/Configuration-swift.struct/MacIdiomStyle-swift.enum/automatic] lets the system choose the appropriate style. Select a specific style to force the button to always use that style.

## Configuring the appearance on macOS

- **UIButton.Configuration.MacIdiomStyle**: The button style your app uses when running in macOS.
